description.@en: After eating the heart of a fallen foe, you are invigorated by its raw strength.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, add 3 to Total Damage results and an additional [[/roll 1D6]] Chaos Die when determining whether you inflict Injuries to your foes. At the end of the Duration, you suffer 3 Corruption.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but triple the duration.

criticalFailure.@en: Imbibing the heart, you immediately bowl over, growing sick. You instantly suffer [[/roll 1D10+1]] physical Peril and are left Defenseless for the spellâ€™s Duration.

reagents.@en: A salted chunk of a heart from your own Ancestry, consumed (expended)
